name: Forecasting Demand - Business User App
description: Forecasting Demand at Product Level using time series trained models

appStages.name: Introduction
appStages.stageDetails:
{ "components": [ { "label": "HTML", "attrs": [ { "attr": "", "value": "" } ], "content": "

Forecasting Demand at Product Level

DF

Overview

This app empowers business users with smart forecasting capabilities to better plan inventory, reduce stockouts, and optimize supply chains. With just a few clicks, users can access accurate product-level demand forecasts using pre-configured AI models—no coding or data science expertise required. Clear visuals and intuitive workflows help drive faster, more confident decisions across operations, sales, and planning teams.

Key Features

  • + AI-Powered Forecasts: Automatically generate accurate product demand forecasts using industry-proven models like Prophet and SARIMAX.
    • + Guided User Experience: Easy-to-use interface tailored for non-technical users to explore forecasts, compare models, and download results.
      • + Visual Forecast Comparisons: Instantly compare different forecast outputs with intuitive charts and performance summaries.

Key Impacts

  • + Smarter Planning: Align supply with demand to prevent overstock and stockouts—enhancing profitability and operational efficiency.
    • + Higher Customer Satisfaction: Ensure consistent product availability, improving service levels and customer trust.
      • + Data-Driven Growth: Use demand insights to confidently guide business expansion, product planning, and investment decisions.
